definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: The effect of ultrasonic wave on calcium sulfate crystallization is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了超聲對硫酸鈣結晶過程的影響。

sentences.english: Calcium sulphate whisker is a new type material.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸鈣晶須屬於新型材料。

sentences.english: Calcium sulphate whisker was prepared by hydrothermal method using seawater or brine as raw material.
sentences.chinese: 以海水滷水爲原料，採用水熱法制備了硫酸鈣晶須。

sentences.english: Hemihydrate can be used instead of gypsum.
sentences.chinese: 半水物硫酸鈣可以用來代替石膏。

sentences.english: The capacity of diffluence of calcium carbonate and calcium sulphate is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了腐鈉對碳酸鈣和硫酸鈣的溶垢性能。

sentences.english: Calcium sulphate whisker is a new nonmetal material prepared from gypsum.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸鈣晶須是由生石膏製備而成的新型非金屬材料。

sentences.english: And the fouling of CaSO4 have been studied in the Vapor-Liquid-Solid Three-Phase Flow.
sentences.chinese: 研究了汽液固三相流條件下硫酸鈣的結垢過程。

sentences.english: Conclusion Medical grade calcium sulfate (Osteoset) is an ideal bone graft substitute with excellent bone repair effect.
sentences.chinese: 結論醫用硫酸鈣是一種成骨性能優良的骨移植材料。
